Oops, sorry, I sent my post right before this one came.

::Firearm/Kluster::

The cannons hit Firearm, putting him into stasis lock and throwing 
him out of Astroblast's path. He hits the shield of the Cybertronian 
Fire, a sickening frying sound audible as the shield begins to fry 
his superstructure.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster looks up, seeing gunfire and seeing Firearm slamming into the 
shields. He taps a few keys, getting the shields ready to flicker off 
for a second to let Firearm fall through. But he'd need to get 
Astroblast's attention away from there first.

He aims his missile launcher, firing two missiles at Astroblast.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Astroblast::
> Astroblast finally reaches the CF. He sees an injured Firearm and 
> a squashed Beastbox (ouch). He yells to Menasor who looks like 
> he is starting to have trouble, "MENASOR, disband!" Then he fires 
> his twin laser cannons four times at Firearm, then transforms into 
> train mode trying to ram Firearm before he gains too much velocity.
